resources.string: (Slide up the screen to pull out this menu)

no note file found(01.wav~10.wav) under the /sdcard/Music/.. \t\nif you want to play custom note files please put your note files from 01.wav to 10.wav under the /sdcard/Music/,Otherwise will play default note files
I found a amazing music app,very simple and fun,make your own music!\t\nhere the url https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.coolmusic.musician
